original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2071)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2071)@</color>召喚雷電對目標大範圍內的敵人進行轟擊，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2071)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2071)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2071)@</color> summons thunder and lightning to bombard the enemy in a large range of the target, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2071)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> Inflict spell damage on the enemy.
